law.catch_line: An appeal to the Commission may be taken by:...
law.text:
An appeal to the Commission may be taken by:
a person who is aggrieved by an order or decision of the State Fire Marshal made in the administration or enforcement of this article; or
an officer, unit, or agency of the State or a political subdivision of the State that is affected by an order or decision of the State Fire Marshal made in the administration or enforcement of this article.
